article: Most American families are smaller than the families in other countries. Most American familiar have one or two  _  . Children in the US will  leave  their parents home when they grow up. They usually live  next to  their parents because they want to find good jobs. They often  _  to their parents or telephone then. And they often go to visit their parents on  _  . Parents usually let their children choose their own  _  . Americans thinks it  _  for young people to decide their lives by themselves. Children are asked to do some work  _  their house. And in many families, children are paid for  doing  some housework so that they can learn  _  to make money for their own use.
